sentences.sContent: Determination of death in ectothermic animals may be more difficult due to differences in their physiology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Determination of death in ectothermic animals may be more difficult due to differences in their physiology.
sentences.sCn: 断定因安乐死死亡的动物可能更为困难因为不同的动物有不同的生理情况。
